allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add myAccounts cashbook feature for PT business finance

Implement a complete cashbook solution that pulls bank data via Basiq.io,
auto-categorizes transactions with AI, recognizes platform payments, and
produces P&L and general ledger views.

Key features:
- Bank connection via Basiq OAuth flow
- Transaction sync and display with filtering
- AI categorization using Claude Haiku
- Platform payment matching \(exact, fuzzy, aggregated\)
- Manual and bulk transaction coding
- Coding rules with auto-application
- P&L report by financial year
- General ledger view with running balance
- PT-specific chart of accounts preset

New files:
- Database migration: 0015_my_accounts.sql
- Pages: /my-accounts/* \(overview, transactions, pnl, ledger, settings\)
- API routes: /api/my-accounts/*
- Components: TransactionTable, AccountPicker, PnLTable, etc.
- Utilities: transaction-matcher.ts
- Edge function: basiq-webhook

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(my-accounts\): Update P&L to traditional accounting format

- Add date range selector \(month, quarter, FY, custom\)
- Restructure layout: Income, Less Expenses, Net Profit
- Show expenses in parentheses \(accounting convention\)
- Add GST summary section
- Add summary cards with profit margin calculation
- Convert to client component for interactive filtering

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process -Name node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force ''C:\\Users\\Troy Morgan\\OneDrive\\coach-os\\apps\\trainer-web\\.next'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host ''Cleaned up''")
